entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
